remarks: Membership in a class abstraction, using implicit substitution.  Compare Theorem 6.13 of [Quine] p. 44.  This version has bound-variable hypotheses in place of distinct variable restrictions.  (Contributed by NM, 21-Sep-2003.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Oct-2016.)
statement:
elabgf.1 $e |- F/_ x A $.
elabgf.2 $e |- F/ x ps $.
elabgf.3 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
elabgf $p |- ( A e. B -> ( A e. { x | ph } <-> ps ) ) $.
